A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I've read a lot of negative reviews\, and they all have something in common: everyone seems to think they could have written the story better themselves.

For one\, I am grateful that the genius behind this story has surprised everyone. We don't know what to expect\, and we still are left without a clue where the story will go from here.

The Last Jedi was one of the best Star Wars movies hands down. The story is amazing\, the creatures and characters really bring it home\, and there's nothing more I could have asked for.
